article_title: How College Health Centers Help Students Succeed

article_metadata.description: Campus health centers today focus on much more than basic medical and psychological care. The new and costly commitment of colleges and universities to a comprehensive public health approach—including prevention, monitoring chronic conditions, and encouraging healthy habits—plays an important role in student success.
article_metadata.author: David Skorton and Glenn Altschuler
